name: Chicken Paradox
description:
NEW! Music by S1gi

Chicken Paradox is a twist in the autorun genre.

Entropy is coming to destroy the entire reality, the last remaining chicken is running against the inevitable end IN EVERY DIMENSION. 
Outrun the outrunnable!
 pass throught portals to summon chicken from other realities, 
dodge the rocks and the EDGES OF REALITY,
and collect chicken nuggets (what?)

Controls:
Arrow keys/touch - move the chickens

Diversifiers:
- Make a procedurally-generated game with functionally infinite levels (or an infinitely long level)!

- Make a game with an invisible tutorial!
- Make a game that uses randomness!

- Make a game where violence is not the answer!

------

This was a game produced by Sergio Stellet, a Brazilian artist who is part of the Nebula Team.
